CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( LeadId__c), IF(ISBLANK( ContactId__r.EmailBouncedReason ),ContactId__r.Email_Verification__c , ContactId__r.EmailBouncedReason ) ,IF(ISBLANK( LeadId__r.EmailBouncedReason ),LeadId__r.Email_Verification__c , LeadId__r.EmailBouncedReason))
CustomField.label: SignificantContactEmailBounceReason
